texto: achieved by a combination of activities, such as: — applying advisory or determinative methods according to published procedures that are made available to the parties prior to initiation of any process; such procedures and their application should provide all parties with full, fair and equivalent opportunities to participate in any methods, and should ensure that any recommendations or decisions are based on the evidence and arguments presented to the dispute resolver; — adop ti ng con fl ic t o f i ntere s t p ol ic ie s and e th ic a l co de s for p ers onnel and d i s pute re s olvers , and only assigning dispute resolvers to a dispute-resolution process where they can be expected to be
